title: Status Description Format, Tools, and Procedure Preparation
intro: In the first phase of this preparation, the following activities were conducted:

activities.text: A decision was made by the executive meeting to initiate the preparation of the status description work in such a way that it reflects the geographical situation, population, social, economic, natural, physical, environmental and institutional status of Chaudandigadhi Municipality area and reveals geographically and socially segmented descriptions.

According to the standard format of the status description, the questionnaire was finalized with the involvement of experts for institutional surveys and participatory inventory surveys, including the results of the National Census, 2078 and various other surveys.
